sentences.sContent: I told Norman I would invest in his venture as long as he agreed to one proviso.
sentences.sCn: 我告诉诺曼，只要他同意一个限制性条款我就投资他的企业。

synos.tran: 附带条件；附文；[法]限制性条款

words.tran: [法] 有附带条件的，有附文的；临时的
规定；条款；准备；[经] 供应品

trans.tranOther: A proviso is a condition in an agreement. You agree to do something if this condition is fulfilled.
